The absolute revolution in productivity has come!

It's in a form of...
... a Chrome Extension?

- Revolutionary
- Amazing

- Intuitive

This is the ultimate description of Finish.it

Featuring Chrome Extension which will change the way you work.
Did you know that almost 90% of people acros the world waste their time mindlessly scrolling through social media?
Now imagine what could you do with all this time.

Finish.it is much more than a simple boring to-do list.
Why?
Thanks to the blacklist feature you will be able to free yourself from distracting websites by automatically redirecting to your tasks. Futhuremore it's all personalized - you choose what will be banned.
You are worried about your likes on Facebook?
In the work hours section you can set time when the extension will be disabled.
We know the best that when you finish your work it's time to relax ;)

Now when you add a new task it's automatically assigned to the website you are currently on OR you can specify the URL and the deadline yourself. The Smart Scheduler will convert your time and the website into a nice new task.
For example, try this:
Write an important email to your boss 16:30 gmail.com

Define your small measurable goals - write an email, finish a text, finally plan your long-awaited world-tour. 
Go set your tasks, a blacklist and let the magic happen!

Be prepared, and finish your tasks on time - always before the deadline.
